statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 9 \\ 0 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ 14 \\ -1 \\ 11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ 20 \\ -4 \\ 20 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
